import './App.css'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import Header from "./Components/Header"; import Footer from "./Components/Footer"; function YeniMusteri() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [name, setName] = useState(); const [surname, setSurname] = useState(); const [birthday, setBirthday] = useState(); const [gender, setGender] = useState(); const [address, setAddress] = useState(); const [city, setCity] = useState(); const [cities, setCities] = useState([]); // setCities=HOOK const [genders, setGenders] = useState([]); const myButtonClick = async () => { let requestBody = { MusteriAdi: name, MusteriSoyadi: surname, DogumTarihi: birthday, Cinsiyet: gender, Adres: address, Sehir: city } const response = await axios.post( 'https://private-d5fb0-nursenozcan.apiary-mock.com/Musteri', requestBody ); let DonusDegeri = response.data.message; alert(DonusDegeri); navigate('/musteri', { replace: true }); } useEffect(() => { //useeffectin içerisine bir fonksiyon yazıp çağırmak önemli bestpractice=en iyi kullanım if (!localStorage.getItem("userName")) { navigate('/login', { replace: true }); } const getAllCities = async () => { let response = await axios.get( 'https://private-c58d6-citiestr.apiary-mock.com/citiestr' ); // console.log("getAllUserInfo" + response.data.SehirList); setCities(response.data.SehirList); } const getGenders = async () => { let response = await axios.get( 'https://private-790a01-gender.apiary-mock.com/gender' ); // console.log("getAllUserInfo" + response.data.SehirList); setGenders (response.data.GenderList); } // call the function getAllCities().catch(console.error); // call the function getGenders().catch(console.error); }, []) return ( <>
